content: Thank you to all those who use my plugins, at least someone expects that I will also childishly act and respond to aggression will do tOkEnStEaLeR. However, yes, still recommend that you be ready/[replace](https://github.com/powerfart-plugins/image-tools#similar-plugins) the plugins, because all the plugins I made for myself and I have long ago developed them to a comfortable level for myself and further development, i cant guarantee including new promised features (I'm also a little tired and the 2021s tried to ban me (haha))... well that's all for sure, it was fun. Adios
Ability to interact with user banner/custom status
Support for stickers as much as possible
